channel.title: Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme

item.title: Sue Wallace
item.description: I’m a Senior Statistician with 5 years of experience working as an analyst in the charity and public sector. I’m a keen data scientist and sociologist, so this blog is kind of about that. I’m mostly using R.

item.title: Text sentiment analysis - Twitter and VAR
item.description:
Detailing sentiment analysis on how VAR is portrayed on Twitter

Note: Because of the nature of the tweets there are some swear words within the charts. If you really don’t like seeing that sort of thing then this blog post might not be for you!

item.title: Fatal Force with Cross Talk
item.description: Using crosstalk and html widgets such as flexdashboard, leaflet and DT to create an interactive application
